content.detailedDescription:
My experience with an ufo occurred at about the age of eight or nine in a little town called irving;(now non-existent) kansas located about four miles southeast of blue rapids, kansas in the northern section of the ���blue valley���.  the year would have been about 1951 or 1952 and the time of year was in the springtime, probably april or may.  (sorry about not being sure, it���s been a long time, about 55 years ago.)  

it was a beautiful spring day, not a cloud in the sky, lunchtime at school and us kids getting ready to play on the playground equipment.  as we were getting ready to play (we had just finished eating our lunch), i happen to notice a small, beautiful, silver, disk-shaped saucer, hovering in the blue sky.  as i continued looking at it, i was amazed that the object wasn���t moving and was able to continue hovering in one spot.  it was far enough away from us that, to me, it didn���t seem as any kind of threat or intimidating but i did have the distinct feeling that it was just observing us children at school.  i pointed this object out to the other kids who also were amazed at it, wondering what it could be.  we had never heard of the term ���ufo��� or had never thought of things like that.  we always had a teacher who, taking turns, kept an eye on us kids during our lunch period and i approached the teacher and pointed in the area of the sky where the object was.  we kids, after watching it for several minutes, got bored watching it and continued to the playground equipment.  while we were playing on the swings, i noticed that the teacher i had informed, concerning the ufo was now talking and pointing to the silver disk to another teacher, both now, seeming to be acting quite concerned and nervous, which confused me as i didn���t understand why they would get upset.  i had just assumed that the flying object was something our country had developed, as it never occurred to me that it could be from another world.  when the dinner bell rang and we had to return to the classroom, i looked back to that section of the sky to see if it was still there and it was gone.  we kids discussed the mysterious object for the next several days, never figuring out what it was.

the recounting of this experience is the truth to the best of my memory.  stan hamilton
content.summary: Silver disk

content.detailedDescription: My cousin, kyle pottle, and i, daniel morse jr., left my house at approximately 23:15 hours in my ford f150. we were en route to a blueberry field in franklin,maine. the field is parted by the george's pond road. we arrived around 23:35. we were going to the field to hunt coyotes. we were traveling northwest on the george's pond road when we noticed a "no trespassing" sign. road was icy so it took a little longer than normal to stop, and by the time i had stopped i passed the sign.So i backed up and positioned my truck to shine the headlights north to illuminate the sign so we could read the whole thing. immediately after reading the sign we noticed a steadily blinking light to the north. we first thought it was a hunter already afield signaling to us to let us know that spot was occupied. so we watched for a few minutes. then it seemed like there were multiple lights that were moving, all the while blinking in a steady pattern, the light would flash on for about 1/3 second, then off for 1 second. then we shut off all the lights in the vehicle, figuring that if they were hunters they would stop signaling. the lights continued to pulse. it seemed like there were at least two separate lights. one appeared to have a yellow tint and the other had a faint orange tint. the lights would blink on in one location and while the light was off, it would instantly move to another location then flash back on. kyle and i, both being  ufo believers considered the possibility that it was an extraterrestrial craft. we rolled the windows down and shut the vehicle down. we could hear no thing other than the wind. then i became very fearful and insisted we leave. as i was backing the vehicle down the road, kyle watched the lights. as he was watching he said he saw about seven lights flash on at once in a horizontal row. then we left the field. on our way to my home in hancock,me, kyle convinced me to go back. so on our way back to the field, we tried to call our friend tim sobel, who lives in franklin, to see if he wanted to come with us. kyle's phone was getting very bad reception in an area which he normally got perfect reception. he tried calling but couldn't get so much as a ring. so we continued back to the field without tim. when we went back to the field the lights were still blinking and watched them for a few more minutes. at 23:56 we left the field and went home, all the while kyle watched his phone to see if his reception would improve. when we got to a hill that always has good reception he still had bad reception. so he shut his phone off. it would not turn on again. so he removed the battery and reinstalled it and his phone would turn on again. in the same location that showed only one bar of reception only a minute ago now showed a perfect four bars of reception. in the morning we will contact the the local news outlets, airports, and police stations for reports of strange phenomena.  i have included an aerial photo of the area and a weather report of the area an hour after we saw the lights. the weather conditions in the report are the same as during the occurrence.
content.summary: Strange lights witnessed near franklin, maine
Witness sited ufo sitting in a deserted intersection in chicago in 1960, one evening on her way home from work.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and saw a cluster of flying objects traveling from west to east. the sun was down, yet the sky was not black yet. the objects were black and did not have lights. there were two clusters in a v formation. the objests were staggered somewhat, not like a perfect v, almost like birds, but they were not birds. they were too big and flying too fast to be birds. it was clearly a group of aircraft. nellis air force base is close and i see f15's often. i would have assumed thats what i was seeing, but there were way too many and they were too close to each other. the first group had probably twenty and the second had about six. they were triangular in shape and flew in the direction of the pointed side like a jet or something. they were right above sheep mountain at about 10,ooo feet to the north of the las vegas valley. i was traveling north on jones and saw them ahead of me. it was very earie and scared me to see the number of objects. i almost wanted to stop the car a get out and point. i looked around to see if anyone else was seeing it and it didn't seem so. i picked up my cell phone to call a non emergency number because i was so shaken and my phone rang. on the phone was a friend who lives nerby. the objects were gone by this time because the whole thing was less than 30 seconds. roughly 10 minutes later when i was home and still on the phone i heard a military jet and mentioned it to my friend and she said "yeah, i can hear it too." i then asked her if she heard anything when she called me and i told her what i saw and she said "no." the jets you can hear and see for miles. the objects i saw had no sound and disappeared out of nowhere. i was not able to watch them for a distance like the military jets. the staggered v formation flew from west to east and disappeared out of nowhere. the smaller formationed followed and did the same. there were no lights, there was no sound. i tried to figure out if it could be anything else at all. clearly they weren't birds. they flew too high, too fast, and were too big. that many military jets would have been extremly loud, not to mention they were too close to each other. the jets usually fly in a straight line and i have never seen more than a hand full. this was a cluster of flying objects. i am not crazy, i was not under the influence of anything, and i am curious if anyone else saw this event.
content.summary: Two clusters of flying objects in a v formation, first cluster w/ about 20, second group had about 6.

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful day here in fort worth, tx and i decided to take few pictures. a diamond shape or boomerang object appeared in one of the photos, and i did not see it at the time.  i heard no sound.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the beautiful sky and saw a ufo after downloading into the computer.

content.detailedDescription: We were outside taking pictures of the weather and saw nothing until we downloaded the pictures in the computer.  the picture shows a ball of light which has a tail (shadow), and does not look like an airplane.  we heard no noise at all.  what do you think it is?
content.summary: We took a picture of the evening sky and only saw after download into computer.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
i sent you my sighting in an email.Sorry,i didn't realize you had this form.Please contact me if you would like to see photos.Please let me know if i need to redo my description on this form.  


sincerely,
kimberly t. rizzi
saint charles,il
content.summary: 3 black objects turned into silver metallic objects triangle formation,enhanced photo shows silver top shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
I took my then girl friend to a movie and when she and i got to her house
she looked for her keys so i turned to look at the stars and saw what i thought was a shooting star then it broke in too about six or eight more star like objects then they form a v shap then went in too a tight cluster by then my lady friend turned to see what i was look at when she saw it she asked what is that i had no i said i don't know and we went in the house. i called the police but they just made me feel like i was crazy so i droped it. but what i saw was real.
content.summary: I looked up in the night sky and saw what i thought was a star

content.detailedDescription: I was to scared to remember, help me please i think they probed me, my anal area is raw and infected...I feel so alone, i heard them say send marcin he is the one...Phone home...Phone hoommmeeee
content.summary: It moved fast and was blinking and dropped what looked like fecal matter

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the street close to my home in a large subdivision in central quezon city. there appeared to be a bright yellow light about 20 degrees above the horizon. my eyesight is not real good as my contact lens are not new and my sight is pretty weird at times at night as my eyes are burning from the high amount of polution here. i went inside the house to see if i had a camera in the house so i could maybe get some pictures. my luck was not good as no camera was there. my sister-in-law went outside with me as her curosity was awaken by my stories i told her about the new flap of ufo sightings around the world. she discribed the lights to me and said it seemed to be moving back towards our house but it did not come toward us. i asked the intent like art bell was talking about sat nights show. i asked the object to come back to our area but it did not. ws watched it move slowely away and it apperared to be blocked by the trees in our area. the lights wer very unusual as they stayed in the same location for over 20 minutes. the primary color was yellow and there was a red light flashing and she said there appaered to have some rotating lights at times. i checked to see if this was the international space station and we are not in the pattern now. i saw the space station about 3 years ago and i thought it was a ufo. but this was not a helocopter or a aircraft. i estimate the lights were maybe 3 to 4 miles away as a minimum. as we veiwed the lights a merorite came right near this area and we was thinking  this was a sign of some kind from these craft occupants maybe.
content.summary: Yellow light that also had a red blinking light.  very unusual and it appeared there was blinking or rotating lghts at times.

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened in 1977 i believe i was 12 years old at the time. it was the 3rd week of march or 2nd or 3rd week of april or maybe even into may. between 4:05p.M. and 4:25 p.M.It was not cold out maybe 68-75 degrees, comfortable warm and sunny. i was just a kid flying my kite. in the distant horizon i saw what appeared to be a u.F.O. it was a dull red in color and twice the size of a airplane, it looked like saturn a ball with a ring around it. it was traveling from north to south i was facing east. it was traveling 2 or 3 times as fast as a airplane. i was located about an 8th of a mile just east of glen ellen road perpendicular to armitage avenue in glendale height, il. i was in awe and speechless when i first laid my eyes upon it. i then turn to the girl i was flying my kite and said look do you see it, she looked but did not see it at first, then she was in awe and disbelief, i looked back to see it dissappear out of site. i then handed her my kite and ran up to were the glendale heights pool was at the time. i called the police. i was excited when i made the call, running up there to use the phone i thought they would not believe me and that i might be wasting my time or even riduculed. we did not have 911 then so i called the operator and asked for the glendale heights police. i was connected right away. the lady dispatcher could tell i was upset. instead of ridiculing me, her first question to me was what direction it it heading in. i told her north avenue, she took me seriously and wanted to know what it looked like and i told her so. i dispacher could tell i was upset, after getting off the phone i went and got my kite nd ran home to tell the family what it is a saw.  please contact me with any questions. did any one aroung my town see this as well? just curious. sure wish i had a copy of the tape so i could hear the police report

thank you

tim
content.summary: Looked like saturn, all same color dull red, a ball with a ring around it.

content.detailedDescription: It happened in the summertime, probably july, i am not sure if it was 2002 or 03, or 04... i was afraid to tell..  i was outside in belmar marina, it was about 12am - 1am.  we had just finished loading our boat up for the summer, it was one of our first big weekends there since school let out.  our kids were in their staterooms sleeping, and although i was physically tired, i was too wound up to sleep just yet.  i wanted to relax so i was lying out on the nose of the boat looking up at the stars, it was very dark this night, not too many lights were on in the area around the marina or the surrounding area streets, the weather was clear, sky visibility was crystal clear, you could see for miles..., very slight breeze, about 70 degrees or so, and like everywhere else, you can always see the sky better when you are in an area with no lights like the ocean or mountains etc.,. so the boat is in the water, i am on the nose staring up at the sky and i see what i thought was a star at first, at first it appeared so far away, it was amoungst the other stars, i always look for the big dipper because that is the only constellation i know, and this object was as high up as the big dipper but from my possition to the right of it,(if you look at your pinky finger horizontally up in the sky with one eye to use it as a measuring devise, this object was two pinky fingers away or so from the big dipper)anyway, i have seen what "falling stars or shooting stars" look like, i have seen them in plano tx, and montauk li, and this was not like that at all.  then i noticed it was moving, but i thougt it must be me or the boat, so i jumped off the boat onto the cememt docks and kept looking, it was still moving and i know it was because its possition relative to the other stars changed, then i wondered if it could be a satalite or something else because at this point it was still moving in the direction everything else seemed to be going sort of, but then all of a sudden, it stopped on a dime, changed direction and shot straight across the sky in another direction 10x faster than it was originally moving!(again, with the pinky thing, about 2 1/2 pinky lengths) i swear i thought i was nuts so i called another boater over who happened to still be up as well, and he looked up with me, he found the object i was talking about, (or so he said)and we watched it for about 15 seconds, that is a long time, then it stopped again, changed direction again, (now, the total shape it had moved, if you were to draw it on a map, looked like a triangle...)and seemed to shoot straight across the sky at such a speed that if you were to have blinked your eyes, this pin head of light would have moved almost two full horizontal pinky finger lengths by the time you open and shut your eyes!! it was amazing. i know this next part sounds entirely crazy but the entire time i saw it, from begining to end, i felt drawn to watch, and or, compelled to watch this light- and not take my eyes off of it, but at the same time, i felt like it somehow knew i was watching it, even though i was millions of miles away, i felt instinctively like it knew that i personally was watching it, like it knew who i was, where it could find me, and that it could turn around at any moment and "get me in some way" if it wanted to, but it was in just too much of a hurry to come back right now...  you will never, ever make me believe that it was- spacejunk, spacedust, spacecrap, halucionations, or whatever, because objects just don't move like that, in an apparent pattern unless something/someone is moving it, and i do not drink alcohol nor was i on any medication that night, (or previous night!). i have had a fear of ufo's all my life, ever since i was a little kid, before i even knew what ufo's were, i don't know why, and i don't want to know why either. my husband and friends are always laughing and taking cheap shots at my belief in ufo's but, i swear i saw something that night that was unidentified and unexplainable too.
content.summary: At first i thought it was a star, but a star cannot move that fast, change directions, stop on a dime,wait, and then go in the opposite direction at an incredible rate of speed...Before disappearing straight up and away til you couldn't see it anymore...

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car driving home from my boyfriends house i was driving south down fairfield road near roundlake, il.  i first noticed the object because it was directly ahead of me and lloked as thought it was a plane flying but all i saw was one bright light i looked closer and it was flickering like a star and very bright, it was a orangish color and it was hovering and then suddenly it darted off to the left and it seemed to travel a long distance in just a matter of seconds and then in the amout of time it took it to get to that destination it had arrived back where it started it continued to do this several more times.  at a certain point it was doing circles in the sky.  i continued watching it my entire way home to lake zurich, il.  it seemed like it was following the same route as me just traveling a distance ahead of me.  when i reached my neighborhood it was circling the houses and coming closer and closer to the houses. then i ran inside to tell my mom, she came out to look and it was far ahead in the distance and barely in vissability. during all of this i was very intrigued, at first i was confused trying to figure out what it was for a while i thought it was a plane in distress, but as it got closer to the ground i could tell it was not a plane at all.  that is when i became startled, i was convinced something was not right and that could very well be a ufo.  i have seen this object a handful of times since then driving down the same road. but i usually lose sight of it before i reach the lake zurich area.
content.summary: Multiple sightnings of a large star huvering seeming to move slowly but then darting a long distance in a matter of seconds

content.detailedDescription:
Danny victory
north little rock, arkansas	

	it was the 1st of november 1985 and four of us, me, my brother mike victory, and our two friends jimmy and david bryant who are brothers, drove up to menifee arkansas one night to our deer camp to clean up the cabin before deer season opened. after dark we were sitting in the cabin in front of the fireplace talking when my brother mike went outside to check on the dogs in the back. he was gone a long time. david went outside to see what happened to mike and he did not come back. we were waiting on them to come back so we could go home, then jimmy went outside to see were they went. just a few minutes later jimmy opened the patio door and said ���hey danny, come look at this outside!��� i walked outside and saw everyone looking off to the north across from us on the next ridge was this huge round object. it was just above the tree tops and glowing and pulsating. it looked like it had heat coming off of it. after watching this object for along time, a jet plane flew over us from the south and flew north over the object. the plane just went on like it never saw the object. as the plane flew over the object, the object moved up in the air a little and stopped. it sat for a second or two then it started moving very very slowly towards us. as it got closer we could see the shape was triangle shaped. this object ended up coming right in front of us above our heads and paused for awhile never making a sound. it was right above the tree tops, so close i could have hit it with a rock. it was huge, about the size of a football field. we sat and watched it for what seemed like along time. we could see all underneath the object, it had big clear lights spaced out all underneath it. we could see all the metal work and designs underneath the object. while we were watching the object, to the east of us was a group of c130's crossing over the river. after the last plane past out of sight, the object went from a pause to shooting off at a high rate of speed to the south east towards conway arkansas in a matter of 2 to 3 seconds. and we could still see it as far as we could see way off and stopped and started blinking. when the object took off it did not make any noise what so ever. on the way home we did not say much about it. we were all stunned i guess. over the years since i have told a few people about it, some believe it and some don���t believe it. but i will swear on my death bed, i am a christian and know what the bible says about all liars going to hell, so before god knowing this....This is my statement.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo, made no noise, size of a football field, stopped above our heads for along period of time, and 4 of us saw it.

content.detailedDescription: Please call me if you need more info
content.summary: Elongated object crossing the sky quicky sw to nw  straight line but slowly turning

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the bar & i saw a starnge object so i started crying and then i scremed and aliens were talking to me & i was scared and ran away
content.summary: I was scared i saw aliens

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, her parents and i witnessed a very strange object at approximately 20:10 on saturday, february 18, 2007. the object had no discernable shape or size, but must have been somewhat large due to its apparent distance from our location, two miles west of colmesneil, tx. on highway 1745. 

the object was very bright white, but alternated color to blue-white, incandescent orange, and red-white in color; which constantly changed in no particular order or sequence, and continuously varied in intensity.

the light intensity of this object was at least an order of magnitude higher than that of any current aircraft landing or taxi lighting system i am familiar with (an order of magnitude higher than systems reported to be 500,000 cp or more). the object was observed traveling away from our location, and the lights on this object were much more intense than landing and/or taxi lights on an approaching aircraft. in addition, the familiar blinking of aircraft position lights was not present at all. 

we watched the object from an initial distance of approximately 4 miles and approximately 15000 feet agl, which seemed to vary somewhat due to its erratic motion. considering the distances involved, the object���s displacements must have been significant. the object traveled away from us slowly, due east to due west, for about 35 minutes. the height agl of the object was somewhat constant (discounting the erratic motion); therefore, after 35 minutes, the object was about 16 miles away, considering an estimate of 10 degrees above the horizon. this data would also suggest an approximate ground speed of slightly over 20 mph.   

the most disturbing aspect of this object (and the character that caught and held my attention) was its ���amorphous��� nature. we viewed this object for over a half an hour, mostly through 16x field glasses and a high powered camera lens, and were struck by the constant change of its shape, size, color and position. 

considering its behavior and appearance, we could not come up with an adequate explanation for the identity of this object. the experience was disturbing for us, since we could not explain its behavior. however, if the flight path is extrapolated on a map, it does come close to ft. hood, tx. so, perhaps the object is a new military aircraft undergoing some phase of flight qualification testing?
content.summary: Bright lights constantly changing color and intensity with erratic movement.

content.detailedDescription: In 1979 i was honeymooning in the virgin islands, specifically a place called secret harbor on st. thomas.  my wife and i were sitting on the beach around midnight and three strange clouds came floating in from our right.  my wife spotted them first and brought them to my attention.  something about these clouds was different, they didn't look like normal clouds. the first cloud started flashing and lighting up, and i could see something was inside it.  all of a sudden this big red pulsationg and revolving bright ball came floating out of the first cloud;  the ball started getting brighter and pulsating and then 6-8 smaller bright white balls started circling around the red one and gave the appearance of an atom.  suddenly the little white balls begain to circle much faster and the whole object shot down what looked like reddish white rays down and out of sight.  this lasted about 5 minutes.  we heard no noise at all though-out this entire episode.  i could not see where the rays or what-ever hit because we in a cove and could not see around the small mountain to our right.  after that this atom looking thing went back into the cloud and all three "clouds" just slowly floated away.  this whole episode lasted 10-15 minutes.  like i said we never heard a sound except for our hearts pounding. we were frightened and felt enlightened at the same time. we both knew immediately something very strange had happened.  i always have the feeling that if i went back i could find something.  sine then we have been extreamly interested to know what it was we saw.  i read and watch anything having to do with ufos and usos and the paranormal.  that sighting changed my life forever.  i know that something is going on and i want to know what it is.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red pulsating ball came out of cloud , 6-8 white balls circled and shot  redish white rays down out of view

content.detailedDescription: As we were returning home from gateway park we parked at the intersection of highways 14 and 287 and watched what we first thought to be a plane.  we then noticed it wasn't moving towards or away from us, it seemed to hover over the first range just north of fort collins and eventually drifted a bit north (just left of the 'bellvue dome'?  huge rift next to 287 and 14).  it appeared in the classic spherical shape and emitted a firey orange color.  we were pretty excited at this point and decided to chase it, and we watched as it blinked out - more of a fade, really.  either way, we made our way over to horsetooth resevoir road, and saw what appeared to be the same object drfting along the eastern side of resevoir ridge.  crazyness
content.summary: Ufo over horsetooth resevoir / wrist canyon road, fort collins, co

content.detailedDescription:
I belive i saw a "black triangle" flying ajacent to the airport on friday 22/12/06.

i was meeting my wife from the railway terminus as we live close by thia would be about 6pm.
at the time the airport was actually closed to traffic for 3 days due to fog affecting the sounthern half of the uk, it would be the following day before resuming normal operations.

while walking to the airport i have a clear view of the flight path,needless to say when  saw white "lights" approaching the runway my interest was immediate, the next aspect of the sighting was that  rather follwing the normal decent path the "aircraft" was actually flying horizontal to the ground,and i would say at about 500-1000 ft in height, next there was no sound at all, and the landing lights were all "wrong" what i mean is they were more like disco strip lights in arranged in linear formation i.E horizontal and moving as i saw it, in the direction of travel i.E  left to right and in sequence, that's when i started to feel very eerie. the craft passed in front of me and by which time it would have been just over the landing apron and then it "vanished" or perhaps quite literelly someone switched had the "lights" out ...
content.summary: Possible ufo sighting at major uk airport (when closed due to fog)

content.detailedDescription: I was young when i saw this ufo so i do not recall an exact date/time, i used to visit my father in colorado every summer and one of those summer days i was at the carwash helping my stepmom wash the car when in clear view i spotted this object. it was sunny out, about noon, some clouds in the sky it was very easy to spot and other people at the carwash had also taken notice. i couldn't take my eyes off of it, it was a sphere shape large and shiny, just sitting in the sky not moving. i grew up around star wars and the first thing to come to my mind was "this looks like the death star", it was big, from where its position was it looked as big as looking at a full moon in the sky, and it was silver i recall it was kinda glistening. it was in the same position for around 11 minutes when it started to get fainter than just dissapeared from sight. i really wish i had had a camera that day.
content.summary: Shiny silver object spotted in sky, big, best described as "death-star"

content.detailedDescription: Sometime in the early to mid 50's something occured on laurel-bowie road (maryland route 197) that cause the military to close the road for several days. when reopened--while driving in the vicinity--a large excavation and refill was very noticable behind a chain link fence on the us govt fish and wildlife property--to this day--no trees grow there--lights were seen the night before and no explanation other than govt business was forthcoming. i was just a kid then--but every time i ride by and see the vacant area--i wonder
content.summary: During early 50's army closed road for several days--big dig sight seen--no explanation

content.detailedDescription: This may have ben in march or possibly april of 92 or 93 i was laid off from work and it was a windy day.  my children were young so i thought they would like to fly a kite.  they were too small so i was flying the kite.  the sky was clear blue with no clouds anyware.  i was watching the kite and saw the  the object off to the south of where the kite was. i looked at it and was blimp shaped but it was not the blimp that flys around by goodyear.  it was much larger just a silvery color and seemed to be extremely high. the wind died down and the kite started to drop. i pulled in the kite, and the blimp was gone.  nothing was visible in the clear sky.
content.summary: Looking up at a kite i saw a large silvery blimp shape object i looked away and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading east on e 100 s in lafayette, indiana. the time was about  1:40am.  i saw a bright yellow/gold light in the sky about a quarter of a mile ahead on the left.  i kept driving until the lights were directly on my left.  i then rolled down my window and stopped the car. there were a couple of lights underneath the object and two or three that were very bright spot lights.  the object was in the back yard of the house that is located on the corner of e 100 s and s 500 e.  the object had no sound and did not move.  the object hovered above tree level.  the object was in rocks-throw distance. i kept on driving and the light continuously shone towards me wherever i went.  i then proceeded home.  i came back the next day to see if there was anything that would explain the object or lights and there was absolutely nothing.
content.summary: Driving home and discovered object with bright lights in rocks-throw distance - no sound - lights shone on me wherever i drove.

content.detailedDescription: Round 16 pointed red inside and turns back and fourth when its on its side it moves,it comes about every third day this time second day always arives arond 7:30 to about7:45-8 then it leaves...I leave in deerwood citrus co.,fl and this is the fourth time i seen it...It will be back ...I have very good bin., just wish i had a good camera i wish they would find out if this is what i think it is:other people has seen this lite in the sky
content.summary: Sat in same spot and turned back and fourth

content.detailedDescription:
This was my first ufo sighting.  from my house the ufo seemed in relation to me to be in the direction of the glen kernen golf and country club which is a non-public gated community in an area directly to the west of my house.  (my house is at approx. glen kernan pkwy and hodges blvd.)

i was sitting in my room with my window open when i heard sounds of engines revving.  at first it reminded me of the starting sound of police sirens but instead of ending the pitch cycle the pitch went higher and higher as the sound continued like an engine being revved.  it was a sort of "silky" whirring sound.  it was a sound i had never heard before from any engine.  when i heard the sound it sounded like an aircraft taking off right from inside our neighborhood because of the volume of the noise.  that of course is weird since my area is heavily developed and housed.  my actual impression is that it took off.  the total time from total silence to maximum pitch/volume was between 5-10 seconds.

i immediately thought it was ufo and i ran outside after a few seconds of listening.  i saw four white lights in a square formation and a red light on one side hovering in the western sky above the tree line which begins five houses down from ours.  either the craft was smaller and indeed hovering above the tree line itself, or much much bigger and hence farther away.  it was dusk so it was difficult to make out the contours of the craft.  

the craft itself seemed to be just black, faintly visible against the dark sky.  the lights seemed to be from the underside edges of the craft.  the top may have had a dome.  the craft was just hovering above the trees.  almost just slightly gliding.  moving slowly.  and most definitely hovering.  the sound of the engines became quieter and seemed to fade in intensity while the actual pitch of the sound remained the same.  the number of lights may have been more because of the angle which i saw it at, i couldn't be sure.  but i know there were at least four white lights in a square formation and at least one red light.  there were no chopper sounds.  they were entirely engine based sounds.  the sounds also started from complete silence, unlike the sounds of planes overhead which you can hear from miles away before they fly over.  

it appeared to be large and close.  if i were to hold up a coin, it might have been two inches or more diameter.  i lost sight of the craft as it slowly hovered out of visibility behind the tree tops.  (the trees here a very very tall.)  

one thing to note:  three entire days before this incident, our skies had been non-stop chemtrailed with jet after passing jet literally clouding the entire sky, perhaps a cloud cover?  then the day immediately after and every day after the ufo's appearance there have been no such clouding of the skies by passing aircraft.

other thing to note:  the same day as the sighting much earlier in the day there was violent thunder and lightning storms in the area with torrential downpour- very uncharacteristic of the weather in my opinion.  several times lightning touched down very close to my own proximity and the rain was very very heavy.  when the actual sighting occurred the skies where dry as though nothing had happened.
content.summary: Seemingly large craft taking off and hovering above my neighborhood in evening sky with strange engine sounds

content.detailedDescription: It was a normal day nothing unusual i was eating dinner with my friends matthew and ryan we were getting up to wash are plates when we heard a wierd humming noise coming from my window i opened it very slowly thats when me and my friends saw a huge! bullet thing it was like a blimp but sharper looking in the what looked like the front.Me and my friends went outside to see what was it when a small red light flickred then we noticed the flying object was silent and then a even smaller light flickred we started to back up when beam of light blue flew towrds us we were quickly teleported into a light room so light we could barley open are eyes then we saw figures coming towrds us then we felt pains on are feet we were screeming very loud then the strange figures just went away matthew got up and looked at his feet the light turned off and we were back on the floor of are house parking lot we checked are feet when we were done ryan looked at the sky and saw the object he threw a rock at it then the rock blew up and the ufo floated away.
content.summary: Round,long,large,light.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were laying in lawn chairs on a patio, looking up at the sky and talking when we observed several disc shaped objects in a v formation flying from west to east at a very high rate of speed. we didn't know what they were, but we knew they were moving too fast to be aircraft. their altitude was very high. they looked like lights as if stars in a formation. seconds later the objects appeared again flying at a high rate of speed flying from the east to the west. just a few seconds later they appeared flying from the south, when they got directly overhead they came to a complete stop. one lone object coming from the south joined up with the formation and the entire formation continued northward at a very high rate of speed, and disappeared from sight. my friend and i were very excited, but not really scared. we knew we'd seen true ufo's.  this was north of vance air force base in enid, oklahoma. to my knowledge, nothing ever appeared in local newspapers. just a few years ago, i spoke with a lady who had lived in enid, ok about the same time whose kids had seen something similar. 
my friend and i were just teenagers at the time and because of our ages weren't taken seriously. 
i've been wanting to tell this story for some time. thanks!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several round objects/v formation/traveling high rate of speed across sky, stopped them accelerated immediately

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home one night from a neighboring town, and just outside of a town called adin, in northern california, i seen this object that was very brillant white, that was flying in one direction than without hesitation start traveling in a 180 degree opposite direction. when i first seen the object i thought it was a falling star, due to the brillant white color; however i have never seen falling stars change their course of flight. i pulled to the side of the road and continued watching this object fly all around the sky, when it reached an altitude of, i am guessing, 2500 feet it put off this extremely bright white light that made me see spots for about 5 minutes. after i stopped seeing spots i never saw the object again. after this bright light made me see spots, i asked myself to try and justify in my mind what i had just witnessed, through all my rational thought processes i couldn't come up with a logical explanation. most would say that it was a star that had just burned out and i witnessed it; however the flight pattern prior to the bright light would destroy all theories of physics as we now. i have not had a chance to talk about this event in many years, but i can say with confidence now that indeed it was something not of this plant. saying i saw a ufo sounds cliche, but i really think that that was indeed what it was.
content.summary: Seen a diamond shaped object fly in odd directions and engage in odd turn arounds.

content.detailedDescription:
Work is being done on our apartment building and as i stood and talked with one of the workers, we looked straight up.  there, beside the building was a bright star-like light that just stayed in one position as long as we watched.  this was near noon time.  if it had been a balloon, it would have moved in the wind, itjust stayed still.  
after many meditation-like attunements with unknowns, it seemed like their verification- we are really here.  
i have been told many things that i have found strange and ridiculous - i am a watcher - i am part of the galactic federation - undercover.  well, i guess i'm not undercover any more and perhaps it is time to come out. they have been good to me, kind and understanding of my niavity but always answering my questions.  i think that is the most important fact, my questions are always answered.  namaste
content.summary: Looking straight up, saw bright starlike light
